entry.title: Tuesday night: Rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning this evening. Risk of freezing rain inland overnight. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Rain or drizzle. High plus 3.
